name: Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic
about: What it is:A daily toner that exfoliates, visibly brightens and tightens, and hydratesu2014for a smooth-, even-, energized-looking complexion thatu2018s all glow..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Pores, and Acne and Blemishes.Highlighted Ingredients:- Lactic Acid (AHA) from Yeast: Removes dead skin cells for a smoother-looking texture..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Get visibly brighter skin quick with this resurfacing toner formulated with AHA and BHA to stimulate natural exfoliation. Gentle enough for daily use and non-irritating on sensitive skin, the formula smooths skin, reduces the appearance of pores, and improves the look of dark spots..Clinical Results:In a clinical study on 50 volunteers:
ingredients: -Lactic Acid (AHA) from Yeast: Removes dead skin cells for a smoother-looking texture..-Salicin (BHA) from Willow Bark Extract: Visibly minimizes pores..-Azelaic Acid Precursors from Olives: Visibly boost radiance and even skin tone...Aqua (Water), Sodium Lactate, Lactic Acid, Heptyl Glucoside, Potassium Azeloyl Diglycinate, Triethyl Citrate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Salix Nigra (Willow) Bark Extract, Benzoic Acid, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Heptanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-REN Clean Skincare recommends using this product in the evening; however, if applying in the morning, follow with Clean Screen Mineral SPF 30 Mattifying Face Sunscreen (sold separately). .-Saturate a reusable cotton pad or cloth, then swipe across a freshly cleansed face and neck, avoiding your eye area...Recycling Instructions:.-Bottle and cap are designed to be recycled; thereu2019s no need to separate..-Recycling is subject to local policies and facilities.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really do like this product however, from reading the reviews I understand the girlies that say it feels like their face was burnt. I have used this product before and after washing my face and for some reason I prefer without washing my face and using it. It like takes away all the oil and grime off my face to where then my face feels so clean and refreshed. When I have used this product after washing my face I definitely feeling burning and stinging especially where I have acne. I do have sensitive skin to a degree so strangely enough I'll use this as a quick cleanser before I go to sleep or if I'm in a rush in the morning instead of a deep clean. It is a good product nonetheless and sometimes I'm lazy with my skin care. So lazy girlies this is for you lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The REN Radiance Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic is a game-changer for anyone dealing with hyperpigmentation and melanin-rich skin. This gentle yet effective formula harnesses the power of alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs) to exfoliate dead skin cells, revealing a brighter, more radiant complexion underneath. What sets it apart is its ability to target dark spots and uneven skin tone, thanks to ingredients like lactic acid derived from natural sources. With regular use, users with melanin-rich skin will notice a significant reduction in hyperpigmentation, leaving behind a smoother, more even complexion.  Moreover, the REN Radiance tonic is incredibly gentle, making it suitable for daily use without causing irritation or dryness commonly associated with potent exfoliants. Its non-abrasive formula makes it ideal for those with sensitive skin, ensuring everyone can achieve their desired glow without compromising on skin health. For individuals seeking a reliable solution to hyperpigmentation, this tonic delivers visible results, making it a must-have addition to any skincare routine.

reviews.review_text: After a long day of work, I applied the AHA tonic, and the refreshing sensation on my skin instantly signaled a transformation. The formulation has been amazing!  I have sensitive skin, and the AHA tonic never once caused irritation. Instead, it embraced my skin with a gentle, subtle touch, delivering results without any harsh side effects. Very happy with the product!

reviews.review_title: Favorite Toner - Miss the Pump Dispenser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite toner. I have been faithfully using it since 2019. I've repurchased it at least four times now. However, within the last year REN redesigned the bottle to remove the pump dispenser for the product. This is upsetting because the pump allowed me to get the right amount of product every time. With the new bottle set up, I get too much product on my cotton pad which leaves me with a lot more wasted product and a sticky residual feeling on the skin. The old pump was perfect and I hope REN reconsiders bringing it back.   Otherwise this formula is wonderful. I have oily skin with more noticeable pores. When I use this product I feel that my skin is lightly exfoliated and tightens. It has never caused my skin to become dry. I recently implemented a retinol into my morning routine within the last month, along with using this product and my skin has not dried out. Considering the issues I have with getting too much product on the cotton pad, that says something. I think that the product is wonderful and recommend it. I don't plan on ever purchasing other toners as a result of how well it works for me even though I dislike the new dispenser. It's the only reason this product is getting four stars instead of five.  Formula is five stars easily Dispenser is a three.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been an aesthetician for over 30 years and I cannot live without a toner. Needless to say, I have tried, tested and used dozens of toners of every brand there is.  When I used the REN Ready Steady Glow AHA Tonic, I was in for a surprise! It contains 3 super exfoliants: lactic acid, salicylic acid and azelaic acid to exfoliate, brighten and maintain pores clear. I  FELT IT!!! It gives you a nice little sting on the skin to let you know the product is working.  For dryer skins, I would recommend using it once or twice per week. Oilier skins can tolerate daily use.  It is a clean product and the packaging (bottle) is from recycled plastic and is recyclable as well.  The product is vegan and it is only good for 9 months after you open it for the first time.  It has an extremely mild scent.  I love this product and I will continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The REN Ready Steady Glow AHA Tonic has been a well known product and after trying it I understand why! As a professional makeup artist my skincare is always the most important step in my routine. I have dry skin and started using this toner every other night. Over the past few weeks I have noticed my skin has benefited from the ingredients. I wake up with hydrated and glowing skin which is due to the Azelaic Acid and sugar cane. Over all my complexion has visibly evened out and has a new smooth texture (or lack of) to it. This product has so many benefits that would work well on anyone. Another factor that makes this such a wonderful product is the amount you get. Since this product is used multiple times a week this bottle would last long enough to see results and become apart of your nightly routine. Will definitely recommend, purchase, and continue to explore more products from REN.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has been in skin care for over 15 years I love that this product is clean and recyclable. This exfoliating tonic has a light citrus scent and is gentle enough to use nightly. I used a reusable cotton round on my face, neck and back of hands and found it to be refreshing and hydrating. My serums absorb better when followed by the REN steady glow tonic! I would even recommend this exfoliation even if you are sensitive. Im sure it may take A few weeks to see an actual brightening of any dark spots so be patient and consistent to see results. Love how it also incorporates Willow bark which will keep breakouts at bay and act as an antiseptic to kill any bacteria. Overall I think this is a great product to incorporate into your nightly routine and use as an anti-aging tool!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always had a little bit of a problem with my skin: I tend to get dry patches and redness on my cheeks, and it's always been hard for me to find products that would help me combat that.  When I first tried REN's Ready Steady Glow AHA Tonic I wasn't sure what to expect. I've tried other toners before, but they were never really effectiveu2014and they were always so harsh! But Ready Steady Glow AHA Tonic was different. It's gentle enough that it didn't make me feel like it was burning off my face, but still effective enough to actually do what it says it does. I noticed results within a week: my pores were smaller, my skin was softer and more hydrated, and my complexion looked brighter overall. I would definitely recommend this product!  All in all, this is definitely a product I'll keep using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This toner is so SO good! I have been using this gentle formula every night and my skin has never looked brighter, smoother or healthier. I love the mix of ingredients - pore-minimizing willow bark, refreshing organic cucumber, glow-boosting azelaic acid and exfoliating sugar beet. Who wouldnu2019t want to drench their skin in that?! Everyone needs a good toner, and this is the perfect addition to any skincare routine. The scent is refreshing and uplifting, while the HUGE SIZE makes this last quite a long time - total bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

A must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started using REN ready steady glow toner.Its amazing.I first of all I am a licensed esthetician and I've been in skincare Cosmetics for over 30 years I've used Many products .However this brand  is amazingv.The ingredients alone are amazing they use willow bark to encourage cell renewal lactic acid to exfoliate and Azalea acid which aids in brightening the skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so Iu2019m not going to lie, my skin looks amazing. Iu2019ll be the first to admit, Iu2019m very new to the whole AHA/BHA acid life. And Iu2019m the interest of being totally honest, I can feel most acids on my skin because of the ingredients and my skin is not at all used to acids. Other estheticians have told me it takes some getting used to if it wasnu2019t already in the routine. I was someone using regular toner but I can say that my skin is requiring more due to aging. Off rip, the toner kind of burned the first couple of times I put it on with one of those times being right after I exfoliated which the bottle said not to do but I didnu2019t read it until afterwards so reading is fundamental. This product is already an exfoliant so using one prior to putting this on will burn. I canu2019t stress that enough. It definitely gives an instant glow which I thought was very unique as most toners Iu2019ve used mattify the skin. It also didnu2019t leave my skin feeling so dry after application. I tried the toner by itself and underneath my makeup and loved both. I can definitely see all the praise worthy claims and the improvements in my skin from using this product. My only issue getting my skin used to acids so it doesnu2019t burn so much.   **This review was created through an educational promotional event hosted between the brand and beauty experts.**

reviews.review_text: Ready Steady Glow Toner is probably one of the best toners my skin has ever felt !!  My skin feels so amazingly fresh and so very ,vey clean . The way it cleans so deeply I donu2019t think my skin has ever been this clean . I just love the Azelaic  Acid it makes your skin so smooth. Itu2019s just so gentle but it makes such a difference in the way it exfoliates your skin . It contains lactic acid which also is great on my combination skin type. With combination skin types having a nice AHA toner like this helps it balance your skin out and is so refreshing .  I can literally feel the toner eat up all the dead cells and polish it up . With this toner it makes your skin also feel so much brighter and smoother .The Willow Bark in it  encourages the cell to renew which is amazing !! So if your looking for an awesome toner that makes your skin feel beautiful give this a try you will totally love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use a hydrating toner daily so I was excited to try this REN Ready Set Glow Daily AHA toner. The packaging of this toner is super simple and I love that the bottle and cap are designed for recycling! This toner claims to exfoliate, brighten, tighten and hydrate for a smooth, even and energized complexion. After washing my face with a cleanser I will get a cotton round and apply the toner on it and then apply to my face. This product has a very subtle exfoliation in my opinion and thatu2019s what it states. That it is gentle enough to use daily. The toner contains azelaic acid and that helps even skin tone, reduce pigmentation as well as brighten your complexion. After using this daily, my face does seem brighter but I donu2019t feel that it hydrates like it claims. This toner also contains sugar cane and that is the exfoliating acid. If youu2019re using this you have to make sure you apply SPF afterwards!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest I used to be a little afraid of Toners. I tend to have dry skin so I was afraid that the alcohol which back in the day is what toners were notorious for kept me from using them. No stripping and drying out the skin for this girl. That being said toners are formulated now with more skin-friendly ingredients and offer many amazing benefits that do not dry the skin out. Instead they restore skinu2019s pH, minimize pores and hydrate or exfoliate, creating a complexion thatu2019s more radiant and improving your skinu2019s overall texture.   REN Clean Skincare Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Tonic delivers brighter skin with a gentle toner that wonu2019t irritate even sensitive skin with daily use. I was super excited when I heard that this toner didnu2019t have alcohol in it. REN is formulated with lactic acid and salicin from willow bark extract, which are gentle but still powerful with their exfoliating agents that brighten tired skin, break down buildup and minimize the appearance of pores. My overall thoughts: I loved the  light citrus scent. It is not overpowering and dissipates quickly. After a couple weeks of using this product I have noticed my complexion looks clearer and brighter overall. I also have been using this on my daughters back and have noticed improvement in her to acne scars. I also believe my hyperpigmentation is a little lighter and overall my skin seemed to look plumper and more hydrated.   Meet Jamie:  As a landscape/portrait photographer I have always spent my time behind the lens looking for beauty in the outside world. For the last several years my focus has turned to a love for commercial and product photography and writing. Iu2019ve been recognized by top companies as an influential content creator and aesthetic specialist.

I cannot afford to deal eith unncessary breakouts as they bo longer heal as fast as they used and sometimes would leave a nasty marks. This toner does do as advertised though, it leaves your skin feeling tight and looking less dull. It has not only an AHA, but also a BHA to fight dead skin cells even more. Particularly how easy it was to apply this toner to a reusable cotton round. No pumping mechanism means easier recycling once you are done with this toner, but it is also less messy application in my experience. I also have to give the brand kudos for their care of the environment, being a zero waste company.

reviews.review_text: i have only used this twice, once a week and i have had this burning sensation around my face it wasnu2019t making me red or breakout considering i only i used it once a week. i have seen a slight difference but the burning isnu2019t really for me but my sister had a good experience with it, no burning and she loved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to toner! I have had to try several kinds of toners that would improve the look of my enlarged pores, but none really did anything but simply hydrate the skin or break me out. This toner both hydrates and improves my skin overall! I really enjoy how it sinks into the skin quickly, while also still feeling the skin get hydrated instead of feeling like it doesn't sink in or do anything really. I did have acne-prone skin prior to using this, then my skin just began to start to clear up as soon as I started using a sample size and have now purchased the full-size which will last foreverrrrr. So worth the money!

reviews.review_title: A must have!!! I promise you!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second purchase of this product! It gives me a glow after only a few uses itu2019s amazing! Iu2019ve recently tried ole henriksenglow2oh dark spot toner and it doesnu2019t even compare to  the ren! Only thing I donu2019t like is that they changed the spout before you could press down with cotton swab and it dispersed product, but I think they may have changed it because some people donu2019t use cotton swab. Thatu2019s minor though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a pretty noticeable sunspot on my left cheek just below my eye. Aside from some visible pores and areas of dryness, that sun spot was my main concern, as it was becoming harder and harder to cover with make-up. So, I decided to get a derma peel (Perfect Peel) which cost $300. I was really excited and optimistic. The Esthetician was sure the peel would do the job.  During the peel process...my face definitely peeled (it looked really horrid!). It peeled everywhere...aside from my damn cheek! I swear. The only part of my face that didnu2019t even flake was my problem area!! Talk about disappointment!! Enter my cousin who suggested I try this toner! Listen, after a week of using this toner that damn sun mark is almost gone! To say that I'm ecstatic would be an understatement. Not only is it removing the sunspot, it also makes my face so clean and bright with a radiant glow. Even after washing your face thoroughly when you use this toner you will see what you missed! It's amazing! Definitely recommend and love this toner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is really great for my sensitive skin. I feel my skin is goin to calm down, get rid of the acne and enjoy the appearance of this toner on my face skin. The smell is also very gentle and lets me feel calm.

reviews.review_title: I'm so happy with this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 2 weeks now. The first couple of days I did get a few whiteheads on my chin, but decided to actually listen to all the folks who said you have to power through that stage with new skin care products. They were right. They cleared up fast and left no mark. And I'm really happy with the appearance of my skin. My pores do look smaller. When I woke up in the middle of the night last night to use the bathroom, I happened to look in the mirror when washing my hands, and was really struck by what felt like a pretty major difference in my skin. I purchased the smallest size, just to not invest in the big products only to discard them. When that runs out, I'm definitely getting the larger one. The only other thing I changed in my skincare routine was to add an occasional (like 1-2X a week) application of the Kiehl's pore-reducing mask. Otherwise I still wash with Cetaphil and still moisturize with my La Roche-Posay hydrating cream. Since this is the only big change, I have to assume it gets the credit for the change! It's worth the money, and if you get a few pimples at first, power through!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the sample size and ordered the full bottle right away. I noticed a difference immediately in the overall tone of my skin. I have sensitive acne prone skin and this didn't irritate my skin the way toners in the past have. Love love love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample size of this and literally saw a difference in TWO DAYS! Ordered the full size a few days ago and so happy itu2019s here. I already know this is going to be my holy grail. Perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It does definitely help with clearing my skin. I do use this nightly, however sometimes will skip a night because it is strong. It could make your skin a little sensitive. But making sure you use a creamy moisturizer helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! What a difference this toner makes. I had used other aha serums before and havenu2019t seen a difference. This gives my skin such a glow and a radiance.  Itu2019s not drying at all, and my sensitive skin doesnu2019t react. I use it every other morning on a cotton pad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has worked wonders on my skin. Iu2019ve been using it for over a month now and see a difference. Iu2019ll definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_text: I'm no novice to using AHA toners like this with % between 5-10 but for some reason this one STINGS a lot. I'm glad I bought the small 100ml bottle because unless I see some DRASTIC results I don't think I'd repurchase this....I much prefer that glow tonic from that other brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin loves this stuff! I feel invigorated every time I use it. I have other aha bha toner products. This one seems to have acclimated with my skin the best. And in such a short amount of time. Iu2019ve only been using this for a week now and I already see a difference. Beautiful product! The five stars are also because I can recycle it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not new to AHA, but this product leaves my face so red!  Looking at the ingredients I see this has some oils that can be irritating to very sensitive people, like orange, grapefruit, etc. If your skin is normal you probably won't have any issues. The redness doesn't last very long, but I really wasn't expecting to get this reaction, especially because I'm not overdoing anything, I do not apply harsh products on the nights I use it.  The good things about it: the scent is very mild and natural. I know other people don't like it, but to me it smells a bit like an orange peel. It doesn't feel oily or sticky on my dry skin, and it doesn't sting or burn. I have noticed a small brightening effect, but I use vitamin C in the morning so I can't say which product made a difference.  I will post an update if I see any changes. I got this for free, but so far I wouldn't purchase a bottle. But if you want to try some kind of AHA and don't have an issue with essential oils, you could get a mini.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first this was hard on the skin, I tried using it once a week then moved up to the point I can use it everyday. I noticed overtime that my skin became clearer and smoother. In combination with other products, REN or otherwise I also find it helps those products work more effectively. I have recently added the dark spot mask to my routine and have been noticing small improvements to my hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_title: Excellent for dark spots, brightening and pores!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I redeemed my beauty rewards for a sample size of this toner and Iu2019ve been using it once a night for the past 10ish days. Itu2019s really helped to fade my dark spots and tighten my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve had a love/hate relationship with most exfoliating toners because while I need the exfoliation to keep my pores clear, most are just too harsh for me, even if I only use them once or twice a week. Enter Ren - my skin seems to love every single product of theirs and this is no exception! Got a free 100ml sample of this toner through a Sephora promo and my skin is in love. It still tingles a bit on application but causes no redness or irritation and Iu2019m able to use it every second night. The next morning I definitely notice a difference at how soft and silky my skin feels. Once Iu2019m done the sample (100 ml seems to be going a long way!) Iu2019m definitely going to purchase the full size bottle. As with anything, different skin types will have different reactions, but if you are looking for a gentle yet effective toner I would definitely recommend trying this out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this toner really does make a difference in your skin. can be a little irritating but the glow is worth it. my mom loves this aswell. I dont like the smell but whatever it's just weird not perfumey or anything

reviews.review_title: does the job but not the most cosmetically elegant

Also, after applying this to my face with my hands, I notice a soapy consistency on my hands with some foamy bubbles which feels a bit sticky. This product also seem to leave an unflattering shine (rather than glow) on my face especially when layered with other skincare products which doesnu2019t happen with my other toners. Overall, the product is okay. If you are mainly looking for the ingredients for chemical exfoliation and you only put moisturizer after this step, then this should work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

This did take 2 months for the full effects and daily morning and night. I also use Caudalie Spot Serum. 3 steps, technically 4 with face wash (I use any face wash)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i wish i took before pictures so i could show how much my skin has improved in just two weeks of use. this is truly a miracle product. my skin texture and tone is so much more even, my breakouts are at bay, and i find that the breakouts i do get donu2019t leave dark spots behind. i do use this in conjunction with a BHA toner at night. while this combo might be too much for some, it works great for my oily, acne-prone skin. do make sure to wear SPF in the daytime after use, as it will increase your skinu2019s sensitivity to the sun due to quicker cell turnover rate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is the real deal. I pair this toner with Murad Environmental Shield (orange label). The toner itself causes a brief sting when applied with a pad after washing your face but nothing major. If you have sensitive spots on your skin like I do, Iu2019d recommend wiping around those areas. The toner leaves your skin with a dewy finish which is where the glow comes in. It also adds for moisture so if you have oily skin, you wonu2019t need too much moisturizer with this product. I did also notice that acne scarring went away much faster when using this toner. I first received a free sample and then returned to purchase a month later. The product has longevity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, I am 33 with sensitive, acne prone skin. I battle hormonal cystic acne at times, as well as aging. I have tried pretty much everything on the market to find something effective, yet gentle. Something to help speed skin cell turn over to help all of my concerns. I received a 100 point perk size of this toner, and even that small sample turned me into a die-hard fan. I will never be without this toner. I am now on my second bottle of the gratitude size. I have filled small travel size bottles up with this stuff for my friends with similar skin issues. Each of them have loved it as well. I use it a few times a week at bed time. I will say it is a TINIEST bit u201ctackyu201d if you use too much, but itu2019s not enough to be bothersome. Smell is fine, and whoa do you wake up with a glow THE VERY next morning. The price is on the higher side, but for how long the bottle lasts, itu2019s worth it.. especially if it can help my troubled skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

And it doesnu2019t dry down fast enough for me to apply the next step in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin Which tends to dry out with toners. Not this toner! I use it at night and I wake up with glowing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been putting off using this trial size product due my sensitive skin for a while now, due to not having success in finding the right toner for my skin type. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

However, I find it no different from a similar product from The Ordinary, which is much less expensive but works exactly the same for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

I find that the combination of AHA, BHA, and azelaic acid is very effective for my oily, acne-prone skin. My skin has also been softer and is definitely more bright. I love Ren and they did it again- get this toner!

Super clear and glowy, I know itu2019s this product because itu2019s the only thing thatu2019s changed in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Cleans pores very well almost too well.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely cleans your pores. Mine are spotless. It apparently cleaned my nose so well that it made it red. I've only used this product for 4 days and already see a difference. My skin is definitely brighter. It basically wiped all the dead skin cells off. If u have sensitive skin definitely dilute your pad with water cuz it stings a bit. Stay out of the sun. It makes your skin more susceptible to burning. Not fond of the scent at all. Does a good job of cleaning tho. Posted a pic with no makeup so you can see the slight redness on nose. Very clean skin tho. I always used this on clean skin and it still made my pad dirty so yea it works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great Product. My skin feels and looks so much better. I am a very skeptical person but am truly impressed with this.

reviews.review_title: Really does what it says on the bottle.

reviews.review_text: This tonic does seem to glow up my skin when I use it. I can also see all the dirt it removes, too, which always feels like a good thing! I love the scent. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product does what an AHA toner should do, but I don't think it's something that you should be using daily. I wouldn't say I have particularly sensitive skin, but my skin can become stripped and my skin barrier can become damaged if I continually use a chemical exfoliant like this daily. I prefer to use this every 2-3 days, and I still see results! My hyperpigmentation has been reduced, my texture looks smoother, and it's doing everything an AHA toner should. I just don't recommend using it daily like the bottle says. The scent is a little funky too, I can't quite pinpoint what it smells like, but it dissipates quickly, so if you're sensitive to scents, I think you'll be fine with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this toner, i have tried so many Ren skincare products and this one is as good as others. It is gentle on my skin i have dry to normal skin and it works well for me. It absorbs quickly in to the skin help replenish skin nicely. It has light scent some people may not like it but i prefer scent so it's fine with me. It has AHA that's my favorite ingredient and love the glow it gives and hydrating to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Ren ready steady glow daily toner now for two weeks. I love it!  No complaints!  I have dry skin and it has helped a lot. I apply this about an hour before I go to bed every night so it has time to soak into my skin good.  It has lactic acid (Aha) from yeast fermentation that exfoliates and helps to remove dead skin so my face is so much smoother. My face appears brighter and refreshed in the mornings when I wake up. It has a nice citrus smell that is not overpowering.  Now when I apply my foundation in the mornings it goes on a lot smoother and doesnu2019t sink into dry skin.  I love that itu2019s Vegan and safe to use on my face so no harsh chemicals!  Iu2019m happy I was able to try this as itu2019s my new favorite toner!!  Donu2019t hesitate to try this no matter your skin type!  If you have sensitive skin you can wet your applicator with water and add the toner to dilute it some until your face is more used to it.  I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I initially applied the REN Ready Steady Glow Daily AHA Toner I thought it was going to be too heavy/oily for my skin. However, this was not the case at all. It absorbed quite nicely & did not leave my skin feeling oily. It has a nice, refreshing scent, & it left my face feeling quite smooth. I've noticed a bit more glow since I began using the product as well. I've only been using it for about 2 weeks so I cannot comment on long term effects but so far, I have no complaints & I will continue using it to see what the long term benefits will be...(if applicable) ;-) I would like to mention it doesn't take much of the product to cover your entire face so the bottle should last a long time. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a week now and i noticed my skin has def been glowing! I'm not a big fan of the smell but it goes away instantly and a bit hard to get the product out but not a big deal. It feels so refreshing when I apply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As far as toners go, this is one of the best ones I have tried. There are many toners out there that don't really make any difference in my skincare routine. This one still removes some makeup, even after I double washed my face! It has a light citrus scent and gives that tight/clean feeling as you apply...but without being drying. It definitely feels like I just exfoliated my skin, because it is so soft. I have noticed that my face is more glowy after using it! I like this that has clean ingredients and comes in a recycled bottle. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I plan to purchase this on my own when my bottle is gone, it is becoming a staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This tonic is very powerful. I would recommend its use on everyone except those with sensitive skin types (if you have sensitive skin and want to try it, do a patch test first). Dry and mature skins can use this but possibly only 2-3 times a week at the most. If you have normal skin, use this 3-4 times a week. Combination and oily skins could use this tonic more times, up to every day. I would say people with acneic skin can use this daily too. Make sure not to use it on open lesions. I used it on my dry skin and the next two days my skin was literally coming off my face in in little balls when I rubbed on it. It exfoliates very well. Brightening effects take longer, as the ingredients in it have to literally stop melanin production in the melanocytes. As the skin exfoliates though and moves up through the layers of the epidermis through the 30 day cycle, skin will brighten and you will notice a difference. Almost all of the ingredients listed in this formula have brightening properties. Some have dual exfoliating/brightening properties. This product also helps to clear clogged pores, so you might notice a little purging too. I had a little bit of purging on my chin after I started to use it. I love this tonic and feel it is useful for those who want to achieve gentle exfoliation of the skin and some mild to moderate brightening effects. When I mean gentle, I mean a gentle yet powerful exfoliation that is not physical (like a scrub). I prefer chemical exfoliants over scrubs because they loosen the cells that are held together rather than literally tearing them off of the skin. Plus this tonic smells divine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this toner, my skin looks radiance and glowing. I love that I received this complementary to test and review purposes. I must say I highly recommended it. I definitely feel a difference in my skin after using this toner. No redness or any adverse reaction. Love it

reviews.review_title: Review of the REN AHA Toner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this product a 4 stars.  It has a slight scent, but it is not overpowering.  As the product states, I would use this product at night.  I used this product every other night or twice a week.  When I first tried this product, my skin because red.  I was nervous because I have normal-to-dry skin and I was afraid of extreme flaking.  To my surprise, I didn't flake at all.  I did apply a deep moisturize to combat the dryness, but there wasn't any peeling when waking up the following morning.  After a couple uses, I did notice that my face felt smooth and soft.  I would recommend this product if you are not a fan of physical exfoliants, but I would be cautious if you have sensitive skin because using everyday is not recommended because it can cause irritations and dryness.  However, I would recommend this product to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been looking for a toner like this for time now! My skin is oily but somehow it gets dry spots. I loved how the toner swept up the dead skin cells slowly each day without burning my face. Itu2019s crazy how the cotton pad would legit be filthy even after washing my face thoroughly with a cleansing brush. Totally worth the money!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample box .  I cannot rave enough about how much I love this product!! A few influencers I follow shared the Veneta s I have finally been able to try it. It leaves a healthy glow after use. Not heavy on the face or any annoying tingling sensation Iu2019ve had with other products. Would definitely recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: With a light citrus scent this is so amazing! It feels refreshing and gentle! I can see an evenness in my skin tone since using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great toner to prepare the skin for skincare afterwards. Itu2019s the perfect aha toner for my morning routine. Sometime i also use it during the night lol. It has a nice citrus scent, and it makes my skin feels soft and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing that stands out to me with this product is the clean/vegan ingredients & 100% recyclable plastic bottle.  I am all for clean beauty and a clean planet.  The REN tonic is easy to use; I squirt a little onto a cotton pad and swipe all over my face (avoiding my eye area as directed).  A plus, is you need very little of the product for a single use, so this bottle will really lost a long time.  Another plus is that after application, I can literally feel my skin getting tighter.  If you have any broken skin on your face, you may feel a little burn, but that subsides quickly.  You will literally glow because the tonic leaves a film on your face that makes you look shiny/glowing.  The downside to this product is it does feel sticky.  My fingers are a little sticky after application and so is my face, but what I have found is that applying your moisturizer afterwards helps make the sticky feel subside.  This product states to use nightly and I would never use it before leaving the house or under makeup.  I honestly do not like the shiny look, I prefer my skin to look matte, so I wouldn't want to be in public with a shiny face (I don't mind it while at home).  Plus, I am not so sure this would be too great underneath makeup (haven't tried it).  I apply the tonic every night, after cleansing and always follow up with my eye cream and facial moisturizer.  After a couple weeks of use, I have noticed some positive changes in my skin overall during the day.  I do not mind being barefaced in public anymore and I feel like my skin is a little more youthful overall; clear, even and lighter dark spots/melasma.  See my no makeup selfie attached photo (I am 40 years old).  Overall I recommend this product if you do not mind a little stickiness (that subsides) and a shiny face (some call it a glow).  The tonic has made a positive, noticeable difference for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this toner!!!! Itu2019s very hydrating which is nice because some toners can leave my skin feeling really tight and dry, and this is not the case here! Itu2019s got a nice hint of citrus scent, but not overly fragranced. This can be irritating, especially if you have any open wounds on your face like a recently popped pimple, or if you are an aggressive face washer. But Iu2019ve found if I donu2019t scrub my face too hard or have any open spots on my face itu2019s not irritating! I will definitely keep using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This REN Ready Steady Glow toner has a nice, light citrus scent. It's very runny which is why it instructs you to put it on a cloth or something to apply it. It goes on smoothly, absorbs pretty well and works well. I can see a more even facial tone and I feel good about using it because it's clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing!! I can really see a difference already and itu2019s only been a week. My pores are smaller, my face looks more even tone and looks more radiant. It just looks so healthy!!  Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! This has tonic exfoliates AND hydrates my skin! You don't need to saturate your cotton because a little goes a long way. I was surprised at how well it softens and tightens the skin. It's a little pricey, but it works so it's worth it. Love the 100% recycled bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Instant result, waiting for lasting results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first thing I noticed with the Ren Clean Skincare Toner was how dirty my face was. I used it after I had washed my face and thought I had got everything. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I put a lot of effort in my skincare, since I'm 50 years old now, but this product blew my mind. After just one week I recognized my skin was improving a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: a Glow so bright your S/O will notice
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this once a day(AM) for a week, and I LOVE the results. It really does give you a glow, my husband commented yesterday that Iu2019ve been glowing this week. And if that wasnt enough proof, Iu2019ve noticed an improvement on my skin texture, and the blackheads are noticeably small/less pigmented. Note: I have sensitive, dry skin with hormonal acne. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've struggled with consistent moderate acne since middle school. Until I started using this, nothing has ever worked - my mental health fluctuates and having to keep up a large routine was impossible. I can use JUST this on my face (then always moisturize after), shoulders AND chest and be done? Easy and simple to add to daily routine (I do this twice a day) when I'm doing really good mentally, I usually use a pore refiner serum as well; but my skin doesn't feel like it NEEDS serums or any other skin care product with this. I don't even break out when I'm on my period anymore which used to be painful and unavoidable, my life and confidence has changed drastically for the better. I no longer even wear foundation of any kind at all after wearing full coverage for 10 years. I just use a primer and maybe some concealer under my eyes or on a dark spot I may have - and that's it. In both photos my skin is bare and unedited - I'm not wearing any base face makeup even in the picture where I have a full look going on. This product makes me so happy: I was able to cry tears of relief and joy over my skin for the first time.

I think itu2019s in the nice middle spot where itu2019s not too gentle but you still feel like it does something. The reason why I donu2019t really like it and I wonu2019t be purchasing a full size version of this is because it feels soapy on the skin. When I put it on a cotton pad it kind of feels like a surfactant which is very strange to me and I donu2019t like that feeling. Your probably thinking maybe you have residual cleanser on your face but i only use this toner once a day and I always cleanse my face in the shower to make sure that I throughly wash my cleanser of my face so I donu2019t really know why I get that soapy texture on my skin I just know I donu2019t like it and this is a pass for me.

reviews.review_title: yes yes yes, works for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite, it makes my skin so smooth and clear. I used this pre- and post-Accutane. Before, it worked well but sometimes I would get problem zits. This is why I don't believe in silver bullet products, genetics and personal health have so much to do with how our bodies function, no matter how much product you put on. Anyway, my skin still looked pretty good and I noticed the zits cleared much faster; like in a day with proper care. I had to stop acids while on accutane, but after about 4 mo off I phased it in again. I was getting these tiny tiny pimples on my cheeks. This stuff wiped it out. My skin has not been this clear since I was a kid! Most of my scars have faded except for some deep ones, but honestly I do not care. I haven't had a zit in over a month and that hasn't happened in over 13 years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Made me a believer in AHA!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in my mid-20s, and itu2019s hard to find just the right product for my skin - one that can handle the occasional break out or dark spot while addressing redness and texture concerns. reviews.review_text: I have dry skin but i struggle with texture ! Ever since Iu2019ve used this itu2019s helped so much with texture :) pair this with a moisturizer and youu2019re good to go

reviews.review_title: beautiful glow before makeup application. must try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this toner in a kit with a couple other Ren products, I was super excited to use it as Iu2019ve heard great things. I used this product for the first time tonight on clean skin and it almost immediately started to burn, at first I just thought it was just a tingle and it progressively got worse. I went to wash it off and unfortunately it seemed too late as my face was bright red and burning really bad. My face is still warm to the touch, burning, and beat red long after I washed the product off. I use AHAs and BHAs in my skin care routine so Iu2019m no stranger to this kind of product and never have had a reaction like this to any kind of skin care. I really hope this is a bad bottle for some reason and doesnu2019t happen to anyone else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. It makes me glow, smooths any texture, and my complexion looks so much better when I use it. Itu2019s a must for my routine now. Use it at night after washing my face.

I got this in a sample, have tried it twice and most likely will try it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a fan of this product! I have sensitive, acne-prone, dry skin and rosacea, so I tend to be very wary of products that may be drying or cause my skin to flare up. It doesnu2019t sting, doesnu2019t leave my skin feeling tight or overly dry, and it hasnu2019t caused a breakout. The product is scented, so keep that in mind if youu2019re sensitive to that. I personally enjoy the scent; itu2019s very citrusy and a nice wake up in the morning. I would say the results I get from this are similar to FABu2019s Facial Radiance Pads - slow, but gentle, results over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this ren clean toner, my skin is more glowy and bright. I highly recommed this one and definitely will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great, clean toner. I've found it's a bit drying (might be the cold weather) but if I use a very thick, soothing cream moisturizer after it can combat the dryness. It's great for textured skin & clogged pores(acne). I've got rosacea on my cheeks so I don't put this over it but just in my t-zone and around my hairline, it's a great exfoliator for those areas. Just after a week my skin looks great, smooth and acne spots are healing over, great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg. This cleared my acne with the quickness. I purged for like 4-5 days and then my skin cleared up 100%. Iu2019ve never found a product work as fast & as good as this. I knew my skin loved Vitamin C because the OLE Truth Serum cleared my skin last summer but quit working for me a few months later. This is the only thing thatu2019s helped since. I usually have around 5 active pimples at a time, plus healing ones. But has to down to 0-1. 100% worth it if youu2019re struggling with acne!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this everyday for a few weeks and noticed little red bumps forming on my face. I thought that maybe I needed to give it more time, so I went from using it every day to once every other day. Long story short, it still continued to break me out.   My friend suggested this to me but unfortunately itu2019s not for my skin type.   My suggestion to anyone looking to buy any type of skin acid is to do a test patch, but also to really get to know your skin FIRST.  My friend and I donu2019t actually have similar skin or similar issues and so I tried something that worked really well for her, but had a lower chance of working for me since my problems and skin are entirely different!   Get to know your skin and always test patch! This product isnu2019t terrible, it just doesnu2019t work for ME but it will and obviously has worked for others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and I found this far too drying to use regularly.  The first time I used it, there was definitely a sting to it, which I tried to cope with in hopes that it would be effective enough to outweigh that issue.  At first it seemed to live up to the hype but after a couple days I found that it left my cheeks so dry and stripped that they were building up a thick layer of dead skin cells.  It's unfortunate that it seemed to have done the opposite of what it was supposed to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: FANTASTIC toner. The best toner I have used actually. This product eliminates acne, dull tones and gives the face a smooth glow. With moisturizer, my skin looks illuminated for the entire day. Because of the willow bark extract (astringent) I would recommend to use this one a day, every other day (or a few times per week). Each application really does it's job, and it's important to follow up with a hydrating moisturizer afterwards. My sister has sensitive skin and got slightly irritated when she used this. My skin is combination and not as sensitive, and my experience was 11/10. If you have sensitive skin, I would recommend testing this before committing to the 8.5 oz! I will definitely be purchasing this again when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and have really bad hormonal acne due to PCOS and this is the only toner that has worked for keeping my breakouts at bay. I havenu2019t had any nose or chin breakouts and have noticed my acne scarring has significantly gone down. Love this product and recommend for anyone struggling with acne!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wouldnt recommend for sensitive dry skin. It caused break out and tiny pimples start appearing the next day. I started using every other 4 days and it seems fine. Still wouldnt recommend for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Hard pass! Made me break out!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I so wanted to love this product. Iu2019m a big fan of vitamin C products by OleHenriksen and thought this would be a great addition to my morning skincare routine. Unfortunately however, this product caused several sizable blemishes on my cheeks and around my nose. I do not have sensitive or blemish-prone skin and this was the only change Iu2019d made to my routine, so I know they were caused by this product. It also dried my skin out and had a weirdly sticky finish. Iu2019m glad I had experienced this as a sample and didnu2019t waste any money on it!

reviews.review_title: Fragrance and citrus oils= no good
reviews.review_text: I recently received a sample of this, and had been really looking forward to trying it; I figured Iu2019d like it due to all the positive reviews. Unfortunately, this was not the case. While I am definitely no stranger to actives and acids, this toner was extremely irritating to my skin. I checked out the ingredients and there is a significant amount of citrus oils and added fragrance in it. These ingredients are notorious for sensitizing skin, and I donu2019t get why the developers of this product thought it was a good idea to put them into something AHA-based. If you do buy it, be careful and patch-test first to make sure you donu2019t have an adverse reaction.

reviews.review_title: Give it time, take it slow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first started using Ready Steady Glow, I did experience some temporary redness (20-30 minutes). But I found that taking it slow and only using every other day or only a few times a week really helped my skin adjust to this formulation. It is VERY powerful, and it has completely changed the texture of my skin. Products like this can take some easing into.  I love it so much, though. I can tolerate it daily now, but it might be just an every other day product for some. Highly recommend! Just be patient and take it slow at first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I ran out and noticed my skin was not looking as radiant, and realized it must be this stuff that was doing the trick so I bought the big bottle. I love it and it works really well for my skin. I also donu2019t find it sticky at all, but I use other serums that are sticky so maybe my idea of u201cstickyu201d is warped lol! This stuff is a staple for my skin care routine these days!

reviews.review_text: Love this product!!! I use it in my morning routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Thank you may I have another.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When i first started using this, i felt like it really cleaned my skin of anything that my face wash didn't get, and i thought it really worked. I only used it at night after washing my face. it stung a LOT but i figured it was getting all the gunk out of my pores. after about 2.5 weeks of using, i started to get break outs like i haven't gotten in YEARS. my skin was overly oil and dry at the same time. this was the only thing i changed in my skin care so i'm 99% sure this is the culprit. i stopped using it, went back to my regular night time toner, and a week later my skin cleared up like crazy. My boyfriend started using it and it seems to work for him (he has more oily skin than me), so i think it was just way too intense for my skin.

reviews.review_title: Pontential to be great, just use it carefully.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Meh. My skin definitely gets a little agitated after using this. But reading reviews below, I think using it at night and sometimes in the morning is a bit much to start off with, my skin as ended up with some dry patches at times. It's doesn't smell great but what toner does? I do believe that it has help my T zone pores (particularly my nose, they are like their own oilfields), pores are tighter and cleaner.  I like the pump style, its different and works well with the cotton pads I use. I'm giving 4 stars instead of 3 because I think I've been overusing it so I'm going to reassess my use and see if it helps. It's a big bottle and it lasts a while, good value in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This toner has done wonders for my skin. I used my points to get a trial of it and was quickly hooked. I use this once per day in the morning with no other chemical or physical exfoliation and my skin has just gotten better and better. I notice a glow to my skin and almost never break out. The packaging for the larger bottle is great, too. I don't care for the price of this product as it is on the expensive side. I find this product to be worth it, though. I will continue to repurchase and would recommend to anyone with sensitive, combination, acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this stuff. I have been using the Olehenriksen Dark Spot Toner but I got this with my points and thought I'd try it out.  This is more intense to me but it has been doing a good job of keeping my skin under control - I have less breakouts. I use it at night. I find that it almost gets foamy when applying it, which I love. It leaves a residue on your skin though and I find sometimes my face is a bit dry in the morning after I cleanse so I might not use this every night. Both are great but if you want something more gentle, I would suggest the Olehenriksen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I got it as a sampler and itu2019s the only thing that keeps my skin from breaking out. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Love it - even for sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my first times using a toner and incorporating it into my skincare. I was nervous because I have sensitive and combination skin, and do get consistent cystic acne break outs on my jawline and my neck. Iu2019ve been using this for five days straight and not one time has it dried me out or given me an adverse reaction. I saturate the cotton pad with water first to dilute the toner and swipe it on my face at night and my face has been smooth, less oily in the morning, and I have not seen any additional breakouts! I also love it because itu2019s a clean product without harsh chemicals. Would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Great toner for dark spots and an overall glow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this toner back in the beginning of June, and I still have product left! I really like this toner.  It does a great job of giving an overall glow and has significantly reduced surface level acne and scarring.  I must say that I only use this product at night, as I find that if I use it twice per day, it can irritate my skin.  At one point, my skin did not like this product at all, so I cut it out of my routine, and brought it back slowly.  I think it really depends on how well your skin reacts to AHAs, as well as other products in your routine! Overall, I think it's a great toner, and I would recommend it to people who can tolerate AHAs super well, and to caution those who are new to AHAs to slowly introduce it to your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend- has done wonders for my acne

reviews.review_text: So far I am really happy with this product! Some of the reviews mention a slight burning sensation. The only time I notice this is on the spots where a pimple was and the slight burning sensation goes away after a few seconds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it really did nothing to my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product helps clear the dark spots. I will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good stuff, bought 6 months ago and is safe to use every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't normally write reviews, but this is a powerful staple product everyone guy and girl needs in their routine. At first, I was a little skeptical about trying this out, but I'm so glad I did. The first time I tried it I used my points to get the little bottle. Since I have sensitive skin, it did cause a little redness at the start since it has AHA, BHA, and Azelaic acid, but it quickly goes away after a couple of minutes. And if you wear makeup, even a tinted moisturizer helps minimize the redness until it goes down. After only 2 weeks of use, I noticed dramatic changes in my skin: my random bumps disappeared, my skin tone looked brighter and healthier, and if I even get a blemish or two here and there, it was practically gone after a few days. Also as a bonus, I find it extremely hydrating on my skin after a cleanse with even the most gentle cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
