reviews.review_text: Seeing a noticeable clarity in skin texture and brightness. I love that it doesnu2019t over-dry my acne-prone skin unlike my other chemical exfoliants. Loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin. I love the design of the bottle.  When I applied it to my face, I felt a little bit itchy.  And it's not  enough hydrated for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This aha toner put an end to my maskne. Iu2019ve used both this and the Pixi tonic and I prefer this Ren one, hands down. It feels so refreshing and makes me feel like my skin is clean bright and fresh. It also feels gentle enough for everyday use, though I do cut back to just in the mornings if I am using another acid or retinol in the evenings. I especially like the pump top bc itu2019s really easy to get the right amount of product out. Iu2019m sure this will be a staple for me for years to come.  Note: definitively moisturise afterwards!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this- my skin is super temperamental, and when I first opened it the fragrance turned me off (heavy orange smell) and I thought I would break out FOR SURE but after the first 3 days of using this, everyone in my family said my skin was glowing! Definitely would purchase again!!

reviews.review_title: packaging less sustainable/still have skin issues
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently upgraded the quality of my skincare products and added a few new products, and this is the toner Iu2019ve been using. Even though Iu2019ve seen no dramatic differences, I believe this toner keeps my breakouts more at bay and results in a more even skin texture. It definitely leaves my skin glowing. My skin is not sensitive at all and it burns a bit, if you have sensitive skin Iu2019d avoid this product. The reason Iu2019m only giving this toner 4 stars is because even though I repurchased it I think Iu2019ll find something that works even better, and when I repurchased it the bottle was no longer made out of recycled plastics.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hated it, made my face so much more sensible and reactive, stopped using it after maybe 3 times and the smell was really strong

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and bought a full size when I ran out. This product is such a joy to use. This is probably my favorite toner of all time! I love the citrus/orange smell and the glow it gives. My face has been so much smoother since using this. There is a very very slight tingle but I enjoy it. Only taking off a star because it can be sticky. I use it before bed so it doesnu2019t bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used a lot of products from Ren and generally think they are a good brand with good ethos. However, this product has done nothing for my skin. I have sensitive and dry skin. While it hasnu2019t triggered my sensitivity, which is great, it also hasnu2019t evened my complexion out as I was hoping or helped with ingrown hairs in my bearded area or after shaving. Also leaves a sticky film on my skin after use. Iu2019ll use it before bed and will actually feel my cheek sticking to the pillow. Kinda strange for its u201cstaru201d product.  I do really well with glycolic, so perhaps I should stick to that over lactic acid. Every skin is different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite toner ever! Was having a bad breakout and using this every morning along with cera ve sa cleanser. Helped get rid of my acne and quickly! I have an oily t-zone but the rest of my face is really dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If your skin care routine feels like itu2019s missing something, try this toner! Been using mine for just over a month and it changed my life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're sensitive to scents, steer clear of this! I had to immediately wash my face because it just stinks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a good everyday toner. I would buy it again but I think there might be better toners out there. It's better than most toners that I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have large pores and acne prone skin, I only noticed the slightest bit of difference with using half bottle already every single night. Works decently but for this price I would expect better results. Maybe I would need something with a higher potency, but would not purchase again.

reviews.review_title: Helps cleanse my face from breakouts!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed that without this product my T-zone was breaking out a lot more. I kept buying sample sizes but this time splurged on the full size and I LOVE IT. I love the pump that comes with it, it's so much easier than tilting a little bottle every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love it so far! Iu2019ve been using it about 4 times a week the last month and itu2019s been great for brightness and making my skin feel so nice. it doesnu2019t strip the skin or leave my face feeling super dried out or tight - just soft and balanced. I think itu2019s definitely helped with dark spots and scarring a bit too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this with some accumulated points and glad i chose this product. After cleansing my skin and using this after it makes me skin looks like glass. Glowy, no burning and a little goes a long way. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this with reward points and I will definitely be buying a full size after I run out. I have very sensitive skin and this toner exfoliates and brightens without the irritation. Very potent but doesn't strip your skin like other potent toners. I have olive skin with a tendency for post breakout spots and this has lightened them. Also great for maskne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very effective! I chose this as a reward, and highly recommend it.  After sweeping with a gauze pad, my skin felt smooth but not tight.  While I am not a fan of anything with a scent, this is kind of citrusy and refreshing.  I have medium light, very resilient skin.  It has a bit of a tingle, and I would suggest being gentle with your application.  I see one review where someone used this twice a day.  Even with pretty tough skin, I wouldn't start that way.  I would suggest using it in the evening and then apply treatment or hydrating sleeping mask after.  If you have sensitive skin, I'd start with every other day and alternate with something hydrating.  I will probably buy this once I am through with the generous sample.  Definitley give it a try if you are looking for an exfoliating toner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this toner. I try to go as clean as I can with product ingredients because my skin is very sensitive, but I also have combination skin thatu2019s acne prone. I use this in tandem with a gentler toner. Iu2019ll be buying my second bottle soon, they give you a generous amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. As a healthcare professional who wears a mask for the entire day, I found myself getting clogged pores, breakouts, and a significant amount of texture on my jawline and around my mouth area - all despite washing my face as soon as I take off my mask, not wearing makeup, and changing my mask half way through the day. I noticed that these breakouts were quite difficult to manage.  I use this product morning and night (but I skip it if I plan on using my retinol in the evening), and within a week I noticed my skin texture improving and acne marks fading. This product has saved my skin!   Also, if you use this product (as with other AHAs, BHAs, and retinoids) PLEASE wear sunscreen. It will definitely increase your skinu2019s sensitivity to the sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried so many products that contains acids but I always had a bad reactions to it but this product is so gentle it doesn't dry the skin. I purchased it with my points and I think I am going to buy a full bottle when it finished. I use it only at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I redeemed my points to get a sample of this. I used it every morning and every night. It broke my skin out so bad that it took almost a month to clear it back up. In my opinion, this product is not worth the risk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!!! I can not say enough about it. I was struggling with breakouts from stress and mascne. I had a facial done and nothing was helping. I got this with my points and use it am and pm combined with some other products (cleanser, niacinamide, moisturizer). I use this after cleanser and finish my skin care routine. After 4 days, my skin had noticebale improvements. My mom had asked how I cleared my skin because it was glowing. It is pretty pricey but WORTH IT. It got rid of my breakouts, evened out texture, and overall gave me a glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many different products to try to get rid of texture on my skin as well as unevenness and this works SO much better than any other product. I started by using it once a day in the evening. I will NEVER stop using! Such a great product for its price and effectiveness!

reviews.review_title: My new go-to for a GLOW!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!!! A strong toner that cleanses and gives a beautiful and visible glow. Definitely has an acidic kick, so be sure to dilute if you have sensitive skin. Received as a free sample and cannot WAIT to get more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with acne prone skin, I've used many toners over the years and never had a great experience with most of them. This is an amazing product.   I use this toner once per day and it's never irritated my dry skin. It also works incredibly well and does everything it claims to. My congested pores and acne have improved so much and my overall skin texture is the best it's ever been. I recommend this product to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product once so far. I applied to to my face with a cotton pad yesterday. Today, all of my pimples came to a head. They are ready for extraction, that fast!! Iu2019m amazed lol. I have quite a few pimples right now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty sensitive skin that just always appears a bit too red. I've been using this toner daily for about 4-5 days, and already, my face is seriously GLOWING. I've been after this glow look for such a long time and no products have been able to do it, unit this. When I first apply, my face does get a bit angry red (kinda looks like I just got my eyebrows waxed), but this goes away after about 30 minutes and just leaves a beautiful glow (also isn't ithcy or causing breakouts, so I'm okay with the brief bit of redness). Amazing product, can't wait to keep using!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would have given this 5 stars, except they changed the packaging and applicator between my purchases. When I first bought it, it was more expensive but I could just pour it onto a cotton pad and apply. Now, when I purchased again sure it was less ml for a lower price but the pump applicator literally sprays all over my walls even when I hold a cotton pad on top!!! This applicator seems like a waste of money, more money on complicated packing when consumers want simple packaging. Otherwise - would give 5 stars for my skin.

reviews.review_title: Use Your Points, So Worth It!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Actually really enjoy it! Used my points because I had just ran out of toner and thought eh, why not its free and it actually has turned out really great! My skin feels super smooth, and I definitely see the brightening effect. Best of all I think its helping with acne, as I'm pmsing right now and have hardly broken out which is SUPER rare. Will definitely be purchasing once the sample size finishes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I've been searching for the perfect toner. This is it. Can be extra tingly at first but my skin looks healthy. Some others are too drying or too sticky, making my skin breakout and dull. This is perfect for my combo skin, hormonal acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took a 100 pt perk of this with me on a trip last year. I have very sensitive, acne prone skin. I also had a lot of dark marks from picking at my skin. I used this toner every night because we were in a country that had a volcano near by, so there were a lot of particles in the air. did notice it dried out my skin the first few days(I was pretty flaky and irritated), but after that my skin got used to it. I was addicted to seeing all of the dirt and debris come off of my face at the end of the day. Itu2019s seldom that I leave the house without makeup on, but by the end of the trip, my partner asked if I changed my foundation because my skin was so smooth and glowy! He was shocked to find out I wasnu2019t wearing any makeup, and I was shocked to see how quickly it worked! I have repurchased it twice, with breaks in between to see if I would like something better, but this really is the holy grail!   Side note. Iu2019ve been applying it to my bikini line and armpits to prevent ingrowns, and it has worked like a charm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was excited about this product, but it made my face incredibly sticky. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this! been using this for a few years now. I use it every night. My skin feels sooo clean and does have that glow afterwards. If you do have some open wounds it will sting because of the citric in it, but I still would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing I love it! I only use it at night but when I first started I used twice a day until my texture improved

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It leaves my skin feeling clean and hydrated with the most beautiful glow. I will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased the limited edition 16.9 oz size on Sephora about a month ago after using up a sample size of this and seeing a glow in my complexion the morning after. I've been using this about 3-4 times a week because I'm trying to lighten some sun spots I've accumulated over the years, thanks to driving in the California sun. While it'll take many more months to see a huge difference, I'm seeing a decrease in pore size on my nose and noticing a balancing of texture in my overall complexion. I'm good about applying a high SPF everyday, so definitely use sunscreen if you choose to use this in the morning. I've made a small dent in the product after a month's worth of usage, so I imagine I'll be able to test out the true efficacy of this for another 6 months at the very least. Glad and relieved REN is cruelty-free as I've become more of a stickler about purchasing from companies that have a cruelty-free stance on their products. Give this a try if you're seeking overall radiance and balance on your skin and if you want to lighten those pesky sun spots. A little goes a long way, and make sure to slather on a good moisturizer after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have VERY sensitive skin, especially to fragrance so I was really hesitant about trying this. But because so many people rave about it I gave it a try. I use it every night and this stuff makes your skin so soft and has really helped with my acne scarring. I was really surprised that the fragrance didnu2019t bother me at all and despite what other reviews say this did not burn my skin at all. I will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not use it as much because it was too strong for my skin type

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Please keep in mind I have the 16.9 oz product without the pump applicator (see picture of product below) -  I have been using this toner for several months now and I like it overall. I have had nice results, and I believe this toner lives up to its promises. I have combination skin with mild ance and some fine lines around my brow and forehead. My acne has not reacted to this product, my pores look more refined, and my skin has a nice glow without being too oily. I do agree with some other reviewers that this formula is somewhat sticky compared to other toners. This REN toner is not as water-like as other brands I have used in the past, but I don't have an issue with the formula and it doesn't cause any negative results with my skin or makeup application. I could see people with oily skin however, possibly having more of an issue with the formula. I do not have sensitive skin, so I cannot comment on any other adverse reactions. I purchased the large size product, and I'm not sure if that was a limited edition promotional thing or what but I only paid $45 for 16.9 oz, so price-wise I am very pleased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this toner twice and I have absolutely no acne but somehow I got two whiteheads under my lip after using this. Also the toner foams which is weird to me. Iu2019ve never had a toner that foams as I apply it to my face with a cotton ball. I find drug store toners to be better than big brands ie. biore & pixiu2019s glow tonic are better and both my go toou2019s. Also the price is better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a staple in my day and night skincare. Being a nurse, I am all about easy and quick skincare. If it's not those things, I won't do it waking up at 6 am and right after a 14 hour day. This makes me skin smooth and glowy. I love it and I get tons of compliments on my skin and I attribute it to this (and some other good stuff).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i went to sephora for a new foundation and spoke with the lady and my skin issues came up. i had little bumps all over my skin for months not that i couldn't seem to get rid of despite using great skincare products (not pimples) not to mention melasma spots i lost hope of loosing. She suggested this product and from the very first use guys i saw a major difference! no joke! and i don't write reviews. it's been now a little over a week and my discoloration is soooooo much better and bumps are gone. I have such a nice glow even through my foundation. I'm in love this on is a keeper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wished this product worked the wonders it seems to have worked for other people.  The reviews are great, but truthfully this product irritates my combination skin.  I think this was meant to replace REN's former AHA resurfacing serum - that was the BEST product.  I used it for years before it was discontinued and this tonic is not an adequate replacement for that serum.  My skin is more red now and tiny bumps have appeared where they hadn't before.  And overall I haven't seen any significant positive changes in my skin. The one good thing about this toner is that it really cleans your skin out.  But I feel REN's Clarimatte toner is much more gentle on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my go-to acid toners. Def recommend! Go ahead and buy the large size, even tho the pump is nice on the smaller one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample with HUM vitamins and tried it out immediately.  Pros: -It does make my skin look more even. I have an issue where my cheeks often look flushed(maybe rosacea, I have no idea) and people tend to randomly tell me I'm wearing too much blush. But I noticed this seems to calm the redness down a lot. My skin looked more normal. -It also makes my skin glow -I have acne on my neck that seems to be calming down a bit, so thats nice.  Cons: -the smell is mildew like? If you have ever left a washcloth balled up in the shower, it smells like that with a hint of lemon. Its not the WORST smell in the world but its also not the best. -Leaves the skin STICKY at first. I've noticed its worse on my neck for whatever reason. I just used it and can literally stick my hand to my neck. This lasts for 5-15 minutes. Face is more 5 while neck is more 15. Not a huge deal but sort of annoying if you want to do anything other than sit still.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such a good product! it really works it really does, it really cleared up my skin from all the gunk and it exfoliates like a dream my skin is soooo soft after the 3rd use I started feeling my skin like a baby's but big thumbs up for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Glowing after using this! I also have the lactic renewal mask to really work at my hyperpigmentation and melasma on my face. Theyu2019ve really been helping fade those problem areas.  This really does leave my face glowing! Iu2019m into my forties so also using this on my neck and chest to stay on top of any sun damage there and keep that skin exfoliated as well. Absolutely LOVE this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I got a sample of this with my Hum vitamins and O M G. I seriously LOVE this. I struggle the most with pores and blackheads... like you can see them from space theyu2019re so bad. Every picture I take I cringe because my pores and blackheads are so visible. Iu2019ve been using this for a week and I am GLOWING. My boyfriend even noticed how incredible my skin looks. Iu2019m so happy this literally just landed in my lap itu2019s my new favorite AHA product my skin is so CLEAR!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the entire bottle and this literally did nothing. My skin didn't change at all. So disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really peels the dead skin layers off. I noticed a  difference in my skin instantly. Pores became more refined, hyperpigmentation scars lightened. This toner smells fresh and citrusy. I had a sample of the exfoliator and noticed greater results when used together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this made me break out really bad and I never break out, I really wanted to like this product but it just didn't workout for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this toner! I use it once a day at night and I definitely notice a glow in the morning. Iu2019ve noticed a smoother texture and helps with my acne prone skin. Be careful with whatever serum or moisturizer you are using along with the product because of the AHAs.  I saw previous reviews about it being harsh for some but I started of using it a few times a week, then every other day to now once a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I reeeeally wanted to like this toner. I have oily acneic skin and I thought this would be a good exfoliating toner to keep my pores clear (which it does) but my face does not like this at all. I do have relatively sensitive skin and I think my reaction may be from the citrus oils in this. That being said, I would still recommend this product to people who donu2019t have sensitivity issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Burned my skin badly. had to wash my face after using and baby my skin for a week. didnu2019t smell good. too thin of liquid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a LOT of different products. I have been a big fan of REN for awhile, I find their products are great for the price. I received this originally as a sample and could not believe the difference it made on my skin. When the sample was done, I went back to using my MANY other skin products, but nothing compared.  Purchased the 250mL size and still LOVE it. Use it morning and night and my skin is brighter, blemishes are gone and fine lines are less apparent.  Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A co worker told me about this product and I had been on the hunt for something new. The Keihlu2019s I had been using wasnu2019t really working anymore and I have a hard time trusting a new brand unless I KNOW or can see the product comes endorsed by someone who really uses it and knows a lot about skincare...that is not a pan-handling employee of the brand who just needs you to believe in it to get credit towards their employment. This product is great for what feels like a really good, reinforcing surface fortification.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I have sensitive skin and I can actually tolerate this acid toner and it leaves my skin so glowy in the AM.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This toner was a GAME CHANGER for me. It's the one product I think is most responsible for keeping my cystic acne at bay. I love the smell, and I never found it to be too strong for my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product as there were great reviews and was recommended by skincare specialists on youtube. I loved the packaging at first because it was so convenient but I've noticed that for mine, the product will come up the tube and sit at the top and spill out. When spilled out and dried, the product is quite sticky. I've used it for almost a year I believe and has not changed my skin in any noticeable way. Given that it's a toner, it does make my skin feel cleaner after and I did see the build-up that wasn't taken away with just using a facial wash, but that's all. Sometimes my skin would have an uneven texture when using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this toner well enough, but I do think for folks with dry skin it's not a good idea to use it everyday twice a day. I use it maybe 4-5 times a week at night only and think it does a nice job of giving some glow and gently exfoliating in between stronger products. My free sample has lasted a fairly long time, which is lovely, but I'm not sure I'll purchase it again when I'm finished. There's just less expensive AHA/chemical exfoliants that work better with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm used to chemical exfoliating and my skin has handled it well. This was just too much for me.  It left my skin dry and flakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried sooooo many skincare products over the past 4-5 years in attempt to fade my acne scars and have been routinely let down. This product has been one of few to phenomenally fulfill its promise. Iu2019ve only been using it for about 3 weeks (and only in the morning, every other day because I have sensitive skin and AHA can be very powerful in its exfoliation). My acne scars have been immensely fading and my skin is brighter. So glad I gave it a try! I def recommend to anyone with scarring or dark spots in need of getting rid of them for a brighter glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is very strong. I had to rewash my face so the smell would go away. It made my skin burn and feel extremely dry (and I have oily skin, so..) I donu2019t recommend this product at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I would see a difference, but no. My skin isnu2019t even glowing and this product is too expensive that doesnu2019t even do what it says. I donu2019t know how other reviews can say it works? Will not repurchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: very nice, would recommend for all.

reviews.review_text: for reference i have combination skin with occasional acne mostly in my tzone, acne flare ups around my jawline during my period, and dry patches under my mouth. i enjoy using strong acids in my routine and i would say that this is a medium strength acid product.. beginners may find it burns a bit but people with a bit more experience would find it to be fairly tame. i really really like this toner. it is similar to The Ordinary glycolic one for those that have used it, however it seems stronger without being as irritating. it has a nice slightly orange scent. when you rub it around with a cotton pad it almost foams up a tiny bit... its hard to explain but it really leaves my skin feeling nice and clean while also being hydrated. when i wake up in the morning my skin is visibly smoother and any small bumps i may have had are gone completely. $50 is sort of outrageous for a toner however i do think its worth it given that it smells nice, goes on easily, leaves my skin feeling clean, and allows me to wake up with glowing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love this toner. It gave my skin an amazing glow and corrected my dull skin texture!

I never would have thought of this brand without the sample I tried and Iu2019m so happy I did. The sample will easily last a month, itu2019s 50ML. I will definitely be repurchasing. I used to use fresh Rose hydrating toner, repurchased that 3 times. I really liked it for hydrating, and did notice a difference in my flaking skin in my t-zone, but this toner seriously makes my skin texture even and glowy and gets rid of that surface layer of dead skin. I will be replacing the Rose with this FOR SURE.   Side note: the watermelon toner was nice, itu2019s soaks in beautifully and does hydrate nicely. But nothing in comparison to the glow this gives.  I have dry skin.

reviews.review_text: I returned this after a few uses. I donu2019t think I used it long enough to see any benefits but I couldnu2019t stand the smell, the look, or the feel of it on my skin. It was shiny and sort of pilled after I followed with my Cream lotion/liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING toner. I bought this and my dark spots are almost gone. People say you can live without a toner but they haven't tried this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best toner Iu2019ve ever used. I use it before bed every night and noticeably see a difference in pore size and lightening of dark spots in the morning. It also makes you SO glowy and my acne scars have definitely improved. Initially I was nervous because my skin is extremely sensitive and this made it feel a little tingly and irritated at first, but itu2019s gotten used to it and makes such a difference in the way my skin looks. Iu2019ll definitely be buying again and again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this toner. My face looks exfoliated and clearer after each use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this toner! It has visibly improved the texture of my skin in less than a month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this toner so much, my skin has visibly improved in texture & it definitely evened my skin tone.

reviews.review_title: Evens skin tone and helps with texture!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing for all skin types. I have sensitive skin so it was very hard for me to find an AHA toner that didnu2019t cause my skin to break out. With this toner you want to slowly introduce it into your skin care routine and not just start using it every night right away. I started by using it twice a week and slowly increased my use. It evened out my skin tone, helped with the texture on my skin and decreased the size of my pores. It also lasted me quite a few months, you donu2019t need a lot, I use one pump each time and I donu2019t use a cotton pad I just use my fingers that way itu2019s more gentle on my skin. I also use it in the morning as well as the night but itu2019s important to use it with sunscreen if you use it in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was optimistic about this product because Iu2019ve seen many YouTubers advertise it. I tried it and it broke me out in the 2nd week of using it. Absolutely horrible, and now Iu2019m trying to get my skin back to how it was before. It leaves u sticky and not anywhere near the u201ccleanu201d feeling people rave about. I have oily prone skin, but surprisingly, not have dealt with pimples consistently until I used this product. Itu2019s been an ongoing battle since to repair the damage done. Save your money AND YOUR SKIN from this atrocity of a skincare product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is incredible stuff and the price is reasonable!! Love love love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves skin amazingly glowy, i cant go a day without it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Initially, I was really excited to try this toner because of its good reviews and recommendations from family members. A couple nights ago I used the toner and woke up the next morning with pimples and bumps all over my cheek. I continued using it because there have been toners that irritate the skin first, but go away after a day or two and boom you get great skin. I woke up today with swollen, red eyes that looks like an allergic reaction. I never applied the toner on my eyes. The closest it has been near my eyes would be at my temples. If anyone has ever experienced this, please let me know.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a slight tingle but it's just the right amount that it feels almost satisfying because you know it's working and as soon as I started this 5 months ago, my skin texture has improved immensely. Also I use two pumps per day and I still have about 40% of the bottle left.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This toner is definitely OK! But for this price I would expect way more.. it doesnu2019t make any harm to my skin, but I donu2019t have any visable changes as well. There is many cheaper and better toners on the market, for example Ordinary Glycolic Toner, after which I have way better results. Will finish my bottle, but wonu2019t be re-buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this toner! Iu2019ve been using it for almost a year now and I must say this toner leaves my skin just GLOWING! It really helped minimize my pores and give my skin a natural glow. I really feel as though it cleans my skin and Iu2019ve seen lasting effects. Will purchase again, and again, and again!

reviews.review_title: Tried it again and fell in love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product a couple of years ago and it burned my skin so bad I was left with a little scabbing. I decided to give it another go since my skin has calmed down considerably since then. Now I really love it. I use it once every other day before I go to bed and follow up with a generous amount of moisturizer. I wake up with hydrated skin that's free of flakes. Sunscreen is a must. I don't wear it during the day because it has a tacky and slightly shiny finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in the Sephora Clean Skin and Hair set as a sample...all I can say is wow!! I absolutely love this product! It makes my skin feel clean and glowy almost instantly. Iu2019ve been using night and day for about a week and my pores have gotten noticeably smaller, my skin texture has improved and, and dullness is gone! Keep in mind that it is a little sticky after application but goes away after a few minutes, I donu2019t mind because the results are so good!  Also for those with more sensitive skin, be aware that it does tingle a bit when you apply it so if thatu2019s the case I would say use only once a day or every few days to start.   I already bought the full-size :) very impressed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells great and I like the tingle feeling; however, it leaves my skin feeling sticky afterwards and it is unbearable. I will not buy this again, as Iu2019ve used products that are much more effective in the past that did not leave my skin feeling so gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first AHA exfoliant Iu2019ve ever used and it was a great experience. Iu2019ve only been a face-wash/moisturizer/sunscreen kinda guy before this. This is a great addition and it works well!  I think the best word to describe the feeling of the treatment is u201ctingleu201d as opposed to u201cburningu201c like I would feel from a negative reaction to chemical sunscreens for example. E.g., It felt like it was doing work instead of damage. In the photo, you can see my skin reacting to the AHAs directly after the toner and then an hour after. In my case, I would definitely wait a bit before leaving the house and sunscreen is obviously a must.   My skin is smoother, and my pores are a little smaller. Iu2019m excited to see how it works over time. I will say that this immediately exposed some more problem areas such as pigmentation and scarringu2014 I suppose the years of dull skin buildup was covering most of it haha. I ordered some treatments to help with that. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find this product amazing!  A tad expensive for Me, but it is worth every penny.  It doesn't dry out my mature DRY skin but i only use it as deep cleaning and if i get a breakout. I still have half a bottle of the 8.5fl oz size because I don't need it every day. I especially love that this is a CLEAN products and the pump dispenser is genious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product leaves a pleasant sensation on the skin, but its smell is detestable.  Maybe fragrance-free but the truth is unpleasant

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally donu2019t write any reviews but I just had to for this toner. Itu2019s amazing !!!! Your skin feels clean, refreshed and glowy after using this toner. Overtime it also recovered some acne scars I had from the past . Absolutely love it and would recommend it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this toner, my pores are smaller after weeks of consistent use. Use with caution tho because I have pretty tough skin, I wonu2019t recommend this to sensitive skin. First couple times when I applied this, it has a tingling sensation, after awhile it disappeared. Overall I really liked this toner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Now this is a good toner. It's really helped clean up my skin and minimize my pores. It is definitely an exfoliant, though, so if you have sensitive skin it may be a little harsh for you. My skin is pretty tough but it did tingle and sting a few times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do think this product it is decent but misleading I just donu2019t understand how a product with this much fragrance and citrus extract can be considered u201ccleanu201d. Just be mindful if you have sensitive skin that it may be irritating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as an exfoliator more than a toner. That being said, I have noticed an improvement in my skin since using it. I have very sensitive, reactive skin so I sometimes have to skip a day because it can cause some stinging if I'm already sensitive.  I use it once a day and my bottle has lasted several months so I count that as a pro too. Overall, I really like the product. I have been impressed with most of the REN products I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best toner ever! My face has never looked better. Pores have almost disappeared!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this toner. It resurfaces the skin and gives you a glow. I like the tingling feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I should have done research on this product before I bought it. It irritating my skin and increased oil production on my T zone, so Iu2019m glowing... And my pores ainu2019t appear smaller. Later as I researched it, I learned all the irritating ingredients it has. No wondering...it didnu2019t feel good for me. Do not use it daily...even on their website, they say u201cuse as a once/twice weekly treatment.u201d

reviews.review_title: Great AHA Toner for Daily Used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this toner. I have noticed a big improvement in my skin and I am in my 2nd bottle.  I will be buying this toner again in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely got a bit of a glow going on! Been using this for about a month or so and skin looks good. Received this as a sample, but not sure if Iu2019ll continue with this since itu2019s a bit pricey. Overall a good product though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best products in the market! Learned about it from a Mixed Makeup Blog!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product due to the rave reviews it had received. Iu2019m far from being a rookie when it comes to using acids like AHAs, BHAs, PHAs, etc. - so I was curious about Renu2019s Steady Glow AHA toner. Enjoyed the size and packaging right off the bat. It has a slight tingling effect immediately after use (not a foreign effect for topical acids) but did burn my skin. It left me with tight, irritated, sensitive skin - the affected areas were almost mask-like, in the pattern of the toner application. I assume this reaction is due to the concentration of citric based oils, limonene and fragrance. For acid newbies and seasoned users, use caution when applying this product!

reviews.review_title: Love - Gets rid of all grime
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used many toners over the years and this is finally one that I feel truly cleans off all the excess grime after washing my face. It works so well morning and night for my skin. In the morning it makes my face feel super fresh and clean and at night I use it after I cleanse my face to really make sure my skin is clean. I never really understood the use of a toner until I found this really good one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It took a little bit of time for me to get it right but I love this toner. A little goes a long way. I use it as part of my nighttime routine because itu2019s too harsh for me to use morning and night. I love how well it cleans my pores and calmed down my acne flare. 4.5 stars because of the sort of sticky after affect, but my moisturizer usually gets rid of the feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne or an uneven complexion, this is a great product. I love this as an as-needed chemical exfoliator for even I have break-outs it when my skin is not cooperating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in the Sephora play box and while it doesnu2019t help with sebaceous filaments at all, it definitely helps with acne prone skin and pimples. I even had my partner, who has very acne prone skin, try it and the results on him were amazing. However, do not use on open sores or cuts because it will burn.

reviews.review_title: great, but not potent enough for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a cheaper alternative to the YTTP kombucha toner, love the dispenser, gentle on the skin, results take longer duration of consistent use but doesn't disappoint! it's just a little too expensive for something that doesn't really pack a punch, so it's great if you're sensitive skin and need something gentle. otherwise go for a harsher (probably glycolic acid) alternative which will get you faster results for the same money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this toner it is worth the coins and the hype. Immediately brightens this definitely is a repeat purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a harsh product, but helped clear up my skin and remove tiny bumps on my forehead. If this is your first time using the product, apply 1-3 times a week and then you can build from there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to use this when first purchasing it, after my first time trying it out it seemed fine. There was a bit of a tingling/burning sensation but it was tolerable and it also felt a little sticky. After my second use I broke out the next morning and this was the only product I had introduced to my skincare routine so I knew it was caused by this product. I have pretty sensitive, acne prone skin so just be aware that this might also cause you to break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a free sample of this that had enough for me to use daily for a few weeks, and I have to say I loved this product and the effect it had on my skin, made me so smooth and glowy! I decided not to purchase a full size because although it made my skin look good, it had a strange sticky feeling after application and I figured I could find another AHA product that had the same effect. I have really sensitive skin that reacts to almost everything and this was gentle enough for me to use with no problems.

reviews.review_title: Who is ready for a glow up?! This gal!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this product is Clean. It really does give me great, glowy skin!  I did knock off 1 star only because I find it's too harsh to use as a Daily tonic. If I use it every day, or after an exfoliating treatment, I find my skin gets very red in certain areas (around the nose and mouth specifically). It isn't irritated or sore/itchy, but my skin is visibly red for a few hours afterward. Not sure why...  So long as I'm not using it every day, this doesn't seem to happen. On days I do use it, I feel incredibly fresh, clean and all glowed up! It almost feels like it's exfoliating when I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I want to give this 4.5/5 because this made my skin purge and I was mad, but the end result really is a 5/5. Whenever I have a break out or clogged pores I use this as my toner. Iu2019ll use it max 3 times a week though, if I do more than that it starts to hurt my skin because mine is sensitive. I enjoy the smell, I like the burn of it cause I know it is working, and I feel really pretty and dewy when I use this on the mornings I do. But if you have dryer more sensitive skin do not expect to use this daily. I donu2019t know who would be able to use daily honestly.

reviews.review_title: Stay away if you have sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first applied this with a cotton pad, I enjoyed it, the product felt nice. I had no problems with it. However, about three days later my entire face was covered in small bumps and had a rough texture to it. Nothing else in my routine had changed, so I know it was the product. It took me a month in order to get my skin back to where it was. If you have sensitive skin, I would not go near this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this toner! It has lactic acid which is a chemical exfoliator, so it does sting the first couple times you use it. I would say avoid it if you have sensitive skin and don't use it over broken skin or a sunburn because it can be painful. But if you have dry and dull skin this toner makes a huge difference. Within about a week of using it I noticed the acne scars on my cheek were fading away and my skin overall just looked more bright and glowy. I've been getting a lot of compliments on my skin since I started using it. My only complaint would be that the larger size got discontinued. It was twice the product for a much lower ounce to dollar ratio and made buying the toner much more economical. Don't get me wrong, it is definitely worth the price, but we all like a good bargain.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this toner! However, it is stronger than most toners. Itu2019s safe for everyday use but I wouldnu2019t use it if you have sensitive skin. I canu2019t use it after I get dermaplaned because it stings. But on any other day itu2019s amazing. Like all toners the results donu2019t really show up on their own. Itu2019s the perfect compliment to a larger skincare regimen but itu2019s an important step!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great toner! I notice my skin was dewy and less dull by week 2, and with continued use my skin is smooth and less prone to discoloration. My one pet peeve is the STICKINESS - it feels like I just rubbed an orange on my face, but once I use my serums and top it off with a cream the stickiness disappears.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For truly glowy and even skin! I use this in my morning routine and it is a gentle, day-time appropriate active product (acid).  Perfect way to prep your skin before applying SPF and makeup in the morning.  I first used my points for a trial size and purchased the full size when I ran out. I have combination skin- oily in my t-zone and super dry around my mouth (worsened by retinol/acids). I notice this product evens out my oil production when I use it. Over time, I have also noticed brightening of my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great everyday toner. After cleaning with an oil cleanse, then even cleansing with a exfoliating facial cleanser, I still remove dirt and oil while using this product (I can see it on a cotton pad when I apply the toner). It does help with my pores, dark spots, and oil. I believe that it helps exfoliate my skin gently as well. A bit pricey but if it continues to work this well, then I will continue to buy it.  The second photo is after a full day of NO make up, washing face in the morning, then and oil cleanse and exfoliating cleanse in the evening, followed by this toner. You can see how it takes off so much more of what the cleansers leaving behind. And itu2019s not make up. I donu2019t wear make up 95% of the time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Au du00e9but je tripais, je lu2019aimais vraiment beaucoup, il ru00e9u00e9quilibrait ma peau. La date du2019expiration dit 9 mois mais je dirais quu2019u00e0 partir de 6 mois il u00e9tait du00e9ju00e0 expiru00e9 et ju2019ai commencu00e9 u00e0 BREAKOUT solide. Il a donc fallu que je le jete malheureusement.  Il faut donc faire attention u00e0 la date du2019expiration puisque cest vraiment un produit naturel.  u00c0 part cela, excellent produit, ju2019ai beaucoup aimu00e9 le temps quu2019il fonctionnait.

reviews.review_title: Nothing negative to say at all
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this toner every morning & night. The pump is super handy, especially if you are using a cotton ball. It really picks up any leftover dirt & oil after washing your face. My skin has vastly improved ever since using this product. I actually feel like I have a CLEAN face. Amazing. No irritation, no strange smell. Nothing negative to say at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for 3 months now and my skin has changed in the absolute best way! My acne is minimized my pores are minimized over all skin is soft as a dream. LOVE! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Completely useless product. Did absolutely nothing for my skin. I might as well have splashed water on my face and called it a day. Save your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really good. Every time I use it, my skin feels very clean. I have been using it a few months, so far It hasnu2019t been drying my skin out too much, and I have pretty dry skin. However, I recommend if youu2019re going to use it a lot, make sure you use a good moisturizer afterwards. It does sting a little. Itu2019s nice to see the dead skin cells on my cotton pads after use :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On my second bottle already. It provides the glow after the cleansing also gently exfoliate. It sting a little if u have healing pimple or cuts on ur face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this toner. It feel so good when applied and really has improved my skin tone and skin. Marks left behind from sun damage and skin issues are disappearing and Iu2019ve only been using it for three weeks. Great product not sure how I lived without it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has been so clear for the past 3 - 5 months with this. Not even during my period do I get a single acne. It did cause me a seriously breakout the first time I used it (which lasted two weeks before it all goes away) but this generally happens when you stop using acid for awhile and oil and stuff slowly builds up. It also makes my skin thinner since it works as exfoliating and causing my skin to get irritated a bit when using facial mask or more sensitive to sun but Iu2019m very happy with my clear skin. I just need to apply sunscreen and use less sensitive facial masks. Itu2019s a trade off Iu2019m willing to take. Great product. I use it once every week or every two weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this toner for about a month now and I really wanted to love it. Unfortunately, it leaves my face a sticky, shiny mess. I very rarely have breakouts, but since using this I've started breaking out all across my forehead. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample, and Iu2019m glad I didnu2019t pay a dime for it.  Makes your face feel sticky and gross, and have nothing beneficial to report after a month of use.  Pores are the same.  Also made me break out, but the worst is the sticky feeling.  Get a hyaluronic acid vitamin C serum, and follow with a water based moisturizer. Your skin will thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this toner!I have combo skin that gets oily at times,and this toner works great!Makes my face glow,and it is gentle.I have not experienced any bad reaction from it and I have been using it for about a year.

reviews.review_title: Awesome exfoliating toner, but not daily...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well but beware itu2019s very strong. Definitely not a daily toner, I use it about 3 times a week and my skin looks more radiant and glowing than ever. Took a star off because it doesnu2019t disclose the percentage of AHA. I like to know how strong an active ingredient is so I donu2019t get into situations like these where I ruin my skin barrier thinking itu2019s a suitable daily toner for me. However, I have dry/sensitive skin. Maybe if youu2019re oily you could get away with using it daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Gentle enough for everyday, and great results! My skin is sensitive to new products, yet this one was great to ease in to. I used it once every other day for a week, then once a day for a week, and then twice a day for a long time. My skin is super smooth now, and I truly only need this once a day to maintain. Love this!

reviews.review_title: Love it. Doesn't dry out my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, I have had zero breakouts since starting this product and constantly struggle with that normally. Doesn't dry out skin. I use it paired with Fresh Nectar Serum, and Tatcha Water Cream. Winning combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a trial size for this and ended up throwing it out. I didn't like how it made my skin feel so sticky whenever I use it, and I give it 2-4 minutes to dry down but still felt sticky after applying. Made me broke out too after a day of using. Maybe should have gave it another chance but I was too scared of breaking out. Definitely not for you if you have combination, sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product does exactly what it says. Makes you glow!! I have extremely sensitive skin (I did go through a purge with this product) but after it cleared up my skin looks so amazing! I am a flight attendant so hydration, glow, and easy on the skin are my top requirements. I recommend this product to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This broke me out all over my face, outside of what could be described as purging. I gave it to a friend though and she liked it on her. Do a patch test if you have sensitive skin! I switched to the aha from Krave Beauty and itu2019s been much more calming for my skin.

reviews.review_title: My sensitive skin broke out after a week of using
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product after reading through all the positive reviews but after a week of using the product, I noticed that I developed small red bumps/pimples on my forehead. I thought it was a hormonal breakout leading up to my period, so I continued to use this toner. The bumps got worse and I switched back to my regular toner (Neutrogena Acne Stress Control, which I'm not in love with since it dries my skin out despite clearing out my acne) for about a week and the bumps went away.   After my period, I tried out the REN toner again to see if I'd break out, putting it on in the morning. Later that evening, I noticed the small forehead pimples came back. I will likely exchange what's left of the product for another toner that is more gentle on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is the best thing I have found to keep my skin clear

reviews.review_title: Not for everyday use with my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Be careful how you use this.  I was under the impression that this toner is gentle enough to use daily, but if you use a vitamin C serum in the AM and chemical exfoliants or retinol products in the PM, then you are really not supposed to combine this toner with those exfoliants.  I didn't realize that in the beginning and ended up with a very irritated chin!! after much research, and speaking with someone at Ren, I discovered vitamin C and acid toners shouldn't be combined.  The company should do a better job explaining that to us.  It's not a big deal but it's somewhat a bummer as I was hoping this toner could be used every morning. But I'll have to get another gentle toner for daily use and use this once or twice a week only when I skip on the vitamin C.

reviews.review_title: excellent acid toner if you donu2019t like glycolic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best acid/exfoliating toner Iu2019ve ever used (Iu2019ve used a lot, my combo acne prone skin gets on with acid exfoliators). My skin doesnu2019t love a ton of glycolic, so finding an acid toner that did not include glycolic acid was a huge bonus. If your skin really likes Good Genes from Sunday Riley, it will probably like this as both are mainly lactic acid. For my skin, itu2019s far superior to the pixi glow tonic, the Ole Henrikson dark spot toner (in the blue bottle), or the first aid beauty radiance pads. Also why would anyone buy the 250 ml when the 500 ml is an extra $9? Itu2019s DOUBLE THE PRODUCT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the entire bottle, the only real difference I saw was dry patches while using it. I wanted to love it. I felt it left my skin dull and dry over time. No glow found. My hunt continues for a good toner/tonic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been dealing with hyperpigmentation on my body from hormonal fluctuations for the last 2 years, and this is the only product that has given me results. I use the toner after showering about 4 times a week before moisturizing, and my dark spots have nearly faded completely. This product was a miracle for me - I definitely recommend to anyone dealing with acne and post-acne scars!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Like a level of sticky where my glasses were sticking to my nose.  After around half an hour though, my skin felt super soft and when I woke up this morning my skin was GLOWING.  Iu2019m going to use it a few more times and decide if the stickiness is worth it.

Itu2019s been a day, and even though I only had it on my skin for no more than 5 seconds, I still have a rough dry patch on my cheek.  To give context, I have dry skin with an oily t-zone. I also have mild eczema.

reviews.review_text: it's ok... not great. listed as clean but it has fragrance. even if it's natural fragrance still will cause sensitivity in the skin. you can find better concoctions at lower prices from the ordinary or Paula's choice. l

reviews.review_text: I love this I have been using it for 6 months now and itu2019s the toner I love to use in the morning. Have also tried other toners but nothing beats this one. Would recommend, finished the first bottle and purchased another one right away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This toner was too drying for everyday use for me. I have a super dry/acne prone T-zone, and while it really seemed to help with the acne it also left the skin so dry it would peel. Also, it made my skin feel like rubber after? Very odd weird feeling. I would recommend this to someone with normal to oily skin that suffers from acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice toner that does what it claims to do. I love the well-pump it has for application, you just place a cotton pad over it and press down, usually one to two pumps is enough for me. I have been using this every morning and night for 3 weeks and the bottle is still more than three quarters full. It does not have a fragrance as listed under the Ren Clean Skincare label along with other things it does not have. It offers very gentle exfoliation on my dry/combination aging skin and even completely got rid of some tiny flesh colored bumps I was starting to get under my eyes, which surprisingly did not irritate the surrounding eye area. My skin does feel a little bit sticky after application, but nothing too bothersome. It really gets rid of any remaining dirt and dead skin cells after washing my face. I have also noticed an actual glow with continued use of this product. I have a lot of little dark hyperpigmentation spots from a deep laser resurfacing treatment I had a year ago and am trying out everything to see what works on them. I think this does make my skin more even toned, but Iu2019m also currently using Korres wild rose Vitamin C oil and their moisturizers that claim to lighten dark spots. Either way, I will continue to buy this toner as I find it does not dry out my skin like other toners I have tried before and it makes my skin feel nice and look healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an intense exfoliator for my sensitive skin it sometimes stings when I put it on so thatu2019s why Iu2019m giving it 4 out of 5 stars! But I do think it does a job exfoliating.

reviews.review_title: Noticeably smaller pores after the first use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not gonna lie, my face was bright red after applying this product and super tingly, but keep in mind, I am prone to irritation due to sensitive skin. I was definitely worried, but waited until this product dried completely and the tingling stopped before applying my moisturizer. I now use this as part of my nighttime routine for a deeper clean, acne and anti-aging remedy. In the morning I had noticeably smaller pores and face was no longer red. I continued with my morning routine, NOT using this product and keeping it to once a day use until my face gets used to it. It's day 3 and my skin is next to nothing tingly after using it, however I still will wait until the product dries completely before applying my moisturizer to prevent any serious irritation. I do love what it has done for my skin so far and have high hopes for this product on my skin. Will update review later if anything changes, but so far so good!

reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but this product is so amazing that I needed to shout it to the world. I got this as a reward and was hesitant to try it because I thought it might burn or dry out my skin. When I finally started using it, it did quite the opposite. This has made my pores look smaller, my skin look brighter, and the texture overall has improved. I started using it once a day but Iu2019ve found it to be gentle enough to use it both morning and night. Iu2019ve used other AHA products in the past, but this one has had the best results. I bought the full size product even before my sample was gone because I loved it so much. The dispenser on the full size is great as well for controlling how much product you use.

reviews.review_title: I will never not have this in my routine!

I only use this 2 times a week or so, but my skin literally looks airbrushed the next day, my dark spots go away faster and I havenu2019t had a single dry patch on my face since I started using this. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

My new routine is cheaper and visible results!!!  (Clearasil, ren toner and clique ID moisturizer)

reviews.review_title: An Actual Holy Grail Product and Hereu2019s Why
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So Iu2019m the girl who is a skincare product junkie and has spent over $1000 buying everything under the sun for skin care because everyone will recommend either this product over that product and etc. As we speak, I am trying to figure out how to deal with the 10+ masks that I have.   I have never gone back to the same toner twice, so be well rest ASSURED when I say that this toner is absolutely worth it. I have finally been able to cut down my skin care to a simple five steps, and I always use this toner.   Guys, it does what it says it does, but you have to give it time. Consistency is key, and I repeat again consistency is KEY. I, at first, did not think that it was working, but gradually after two months, I have seen my acne scars and hyperpigmentation lighten. I use it every day, sometimes twice a day when I wear make up. Itu2019s sooooo good, that I donu2019t even do a morning and night routine anymore, just a morning one.   If youu2019re not used to using AHAs and BHAs (chemical exfoliation) regularly, this will sting for a few seconds but thatu2019s it.   This toner matched with African black soap is a powerhouse combo and has kept my acne breakouts to once every 4-5 weeks (and by breakout, I mean 2 pimples tops). This is HEAVENLY when not three months ago, my face looked like the Rocky Mountains (we are talking from blackheads to cysts). I had nearly given up on finding anything that worked the way I wanted and this duo came to the rescue. It is so worth it, I canu2019t even begin to explain it for yu2019all.

reviews.review_title: be cautious if you have sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the packaging and the aha aspect of this definitely drew me in ... along with a super helpful sales lady in the store .. so i bought it and have been giving it a try for about a good two and half weeks now. first using twice as recommended.. then once a day... then once every few days and now, i literally don't wanna try it ever again cause at this point, every time i do, about a minute later, i break out in this large red/sunburn like rash all over my face. another commenter mentioned this as well. i'm unsure if its the collection of citrus oils or if its that i just cant handle this kind of formulation but either way, this was a nope. i know it works for others so all i gotta say is dont buy the whole thing if you have sensitive skin ... unless you've tried a sample for a few days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

My dark acne scars are fading & my breakouts have subsided- I use morning & night. Pores seems a lot smaller as well! By far the best toner Iu2019ve ever used- you will not be sorry with this one!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this with another Sephora purchase and took it with me traveling over 2 weeks. I struggle with acne and rosacea and usually break out while traveling, but couldn't figure out why during these 2 weeks of travel I was having the BEST skin I'd had all year. I finally figured out it was the toner and I am obsessed. Have been using it for two months now and have had clear skin throughout the sugar-and-stress-filled holidays. I spent all of 2019 with at least 1-2 acne or rosacea pimples on my face at a time, and I finally have clear skin again. It's the first time in nearly a year I can touch my face again without pain. I don't even know what's in this stuff but I'm obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 4 or 5 months now.  This toner makes my skin so glow-y!  I'm 30 and have oily, acne-prone skin that scars easily.  Some of my biggest goals are shrinking pores, eliminating dark spots from past breakouts, and just trying to keep my skin happy so I don't have more breakouts (ugh).  I use this toner twice/day with a cotton round after cleansing with my Foreo Luna; then follow it up with Caudalie brightening essence and whichever serums I'm using for day or night, etc (including alternating nights of SR Good Genes or A  retinol).  This toner is perfect for balancing the skin after cleansing, and gently exfoliating that top layer of dead skin before your other products.  The big bottle lasts 3 - 4 months for me (I also use it on my neck and du00e9colletage), and I plan to repurchase.
